name: UCheatManager
doc:
Cheat Manager is a central blueprint to implement test and debug code and actions that are not to ship with the game.
As the Cheat Manager is not instanced in shipping builds, it is for debugging purposes only

DebugCameraControllerClass: Debug camera - used to have independent camera without stopping gameplay

methods.name: ChangeSize
methods.doc: Scale the player's size to be F * default size.

methods.name: DamageTarget
methods.doc: Damage the actor you're looking at (sourced from the player).

methods.name: DestroyTarget
methods.doc: Destroy the actor you're looking at.

methods.name: DisableDebugCamera
methods.doc: Switch controller from debug camera back to normal controller

methods.name: EnableDebugCamera
methods.doc: Switch controller to debug camera without locking gameplay and with locking local player controller input

methods.name: FreezeFrame
methods.doc: Pause the game for Delay seconds.

methods.name: Ghost
methods.doc: Pawn no longer collides with the world, and can fly

methods.name: PlayersOnly
methods.doc: Freeze everything in the level except for players.

methods.name: EndPlay
methods.doc: This is the End Play event for the CheatManager

methods.name: InitCheatManager
methods.doc: BP implementable event for when CheatManager is created to allow any needed initialization.

methods.name: Slomo
methods.doc: Modify time dilation to change apparent speed of passage of time. e.g. "Slomo 0.1" makes everything move very slowly, while "Slomo 10" makes everything move very fast.

methods.name: Teleport
methods.doc: Teleport to surface player is looking at.

methods.name: Walk
methods.doc: Return to walking movement mode from Fly or Ghost cheat.
